goofyplugin.gui.goofyscreen.ok.tooltip: Press this to return to the previous screen
goofyplugin.permissions.value.can_log.to: Allows the avatar to log directly to Minecraft's log
figura.docs.events.error:
(GoofyPlugin) An event that is called when something errors.
Return true to keep error, and return false to ignore error
figura.docs.events.entity_render:
(GoofyPlugin) An event that is called on entity render
Called with the entity being rendered
Return true to prevent the entity rendering
figura.docs.goofy: The dumping ground of the figura goofballs
figura.docs.goofy.stop_avatar: Stops the avatar, as if an error occured
figura.docs.goofy.regex_match:
Returns a list of matches based on the specified
pattern.
figura.docs.goofy.regex_sub:
Returns a string with all matches of the specified
pattern replaced.
figura.docs.goofy.debug_to_log:
Logs data to the Minecraft Log as a debug message.
This will only show up if your Minecraft instance has
debug logging enabled.
Check with goofy:isDebugEnabled()
figura.docs.goofy.info_to_log:
Logs data to the Minecraft Log as an info mesage.
This will only show up if your Minecraft instance has
info logging enabled (it is by default).
Check with goofy:isInfoEnabled()
figura.docs.goofy.warn_to_log:
Logs data to the Minecraft Log as a warning.
This will only show up if your Minecraft instance has
warn logging enabled (it is by default).
Check with goofy:isWarnEnabled()
figura.docs.goofy.error_to_log:
Logs data to the Minecraft Log as an error.
This will only show up if your Minecraft instance has
error logging enabled (it is by default).
Check with goofy:isErrorEnabled()
figura.docs.goofy.trace_to_log:
Logs data to the Minecraft Log as a stacktrace.
This will only show up if your Minecraft instance has
trace logging enabled.
Check with goofy:isTraceEnabled()
figura.docs.goofy.is_debug_enabled: Checks if debug logging is enabled
figura.docs.goofy.is_info_enabled: Checks if info logging is enabled
figura.docs.goofy.is_warn_enabled: Checks if warn logging is enabled
figura.docs.goofy.is_error_enabled: Checks if error logging is enabled
figura.docs.goofy.is_trace_enabled: Checks if trace logging is enabled
figura.docs.goofy.load_avatar:
Load the avatar of a player based on their UUID
GN approved
figura.docs.goofy.get_avatar_color: Get the color (in hex) of a player's avatar from their UUID
figura.docs.goofy.reload_avatar: Reload the avatar of a player based on their UUID
figura.docs.goofy.check_features:
Checks whether the current Goofy version supports the given features
Throws an error if the avatar specifies a newer or incompatible version
All Goofy scripts are advised to run this function
figura.docs.goofy.set_disable_gui_elemen:
Sets whether to disable running the
specified GUI element
figura.docs.goofy.backend.connected: Returns whether the backend is currently connected
figura.docs.goofy.backend.can_upload:
Returns whether an avatar can be uploaded to the backend
This will never be true when not connected
figura.docs.goofy.backend.get_avatar_max:
Returns the maximum size of an avatar
Uploads above this limit will fail
figura.docs.goofy.backend.send_ping:
Sends a raw ping packet to the backend
Only use if you know what you're doing
figura.docs.goofy.backend.disconnect:
Disconnects the client from the backend
An optional message can be specified to display to the user
figura.docs.goofy.backend.get_token:
Returns your backend authentication token
Very dangerous! Do not share!
figura.docs.goofy.backend.motd:
Returns the backend MOTD as a JSON string
Why would you need this?
figura.docs.goofy.backend.write:
Sends a raw packet to the backend
Only use if you know what you're doing
or if you're, say, porting Figura to Figura
figura.docs.collection.sum: Gets the sum of all inputted numbers
figura.docs.collection.difference: Gets the difference of all inputted numbers
figura.docs.collection.product: Gets the product of all inputted numbers
figura.docs.collection.quotient: Gets the quotient of all inputted numbers
figura.docs.collection.map: Transforms each element of the array in-place
figura.docs.collection.each: Runs a function on each element of the array
figura.docs.collection.flat_map: Runs a function on each element and concatentates the resulting arrays
figura.docs.collection.filter: Returns elements of the array matching a given predicate
